articles.author: HOWARD FENDRICH
articles.title: Broadcaster apologizes after Novak Djokovic refuses post-match TV interview at the Australian Open - The Associated Press
articles.description: A broadcaster has apologized after Novak Djokovic declined to do a customary post-match on court interview at the Australian Open to protest comments made on air by someone who works for the host TV network. Djokovic said he wanted an apology from Channel 9 a…
articles.content: MELBOURNE, Australia (AP) The host broadcaster has apologized after Novak Djokovic declined to do a customary post-match on court interview at the Australian Open Sunday to protest comments made on a… [+3276 chars]
